Experience includes ISO, Lean, Six Sigma, and APICS environments.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Staff Geotechnical Professional

Location: Laurel, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Geo-Technology Associates, Inc. (GTA) is seeking a Staff Geotechnical Professional with up to 3 years of experience to join our team in Laurel, MD. Personnel in this position will work under senior geotechnical staff and may assist in higher-level tasks or project management within the Construction Observation and Testing (COT) group as needed.

Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following

Coordinate and manage drilling projectsCoordinate and review laboratory testingPrepare geotechnical reports, or pertinent sections thereofPerform routine calculations, including settlement, bearing capacity, lateral earth pressures, slope stability, etc. under the observation of senior staffDesign and prepare construction plans for retaining walls and other structures under the supervision of senior staffProvide a variety of other observation and testing services for geotechnical and construction observation and testing projects as you support engineers for a diverse client base in the private and public sectors

You must own a reliable vehicle, have a good driving record, like working with people, and enjoy working outdoors. GTA will provide you with Personal Protective Equipment, which includes High Visibility Vest, Hard Hat, Gloves, and Safety Glasses.

Requirements

Bachelor's Degree in Civil Engineering; EIT preferred but not requiredOwn Transportation, valid driver's license and Good Driving RecordWilling and able to work the hours necessary to meet the demands of the workload or to complete any assigned projectsExcellent verbal and written communication skillsAutoCAD experience preferredSlide2 and VESPA design software experience preferred

Benefits

We offer a comprehensive benefits package which includes:

Competitive Compensation and Annual Performance ReviewsExpense Reimbursement401(k) with company matchMedical, Dental and Vision coverage optionsCompany provided Life and Disability coverageOptional additional Life and Disability coveragePre-tax Health Savings Account, Medical Flexible Spending Account and Dependent Care Spending Account optionsPaid Time Off & Paid HolidaysEmployee Referral ProgramEducational Assistance ProgramTraining and Development Opportunities

We ensure nondiscrimination and equal employment opportunity in all programs and activities in accordance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, and all revisions and addendums thereof. #breezyGTA

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
